soot.dexpler

Class DexlibWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.dexpler.DexlibWrapper

  • public class DexlibWrapper
extends Object
    DexlibWrapper provides an entry point to the dexlib library from the smali project. Given a dex file, it will use dexlib to retrieve all classes for further processing A call to getClass retrieves the specific class to analyze further.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DexlibWrapper(File dexSource)
      Construct a DexlibWrapper from a dex file and stores its classes referenced by their name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DexClassLoader createDexClassLoader()
      Allow custom implementations to use different class loading strategies.
      void initialize()

    • Constructor Detail

      • DexlibWrapper

        public DexlibWrapper(File dexSource)
        Construct a DexlibWrapper from a dex file and stores its classes referenced by their name. No further process is done here.
